atDirectives.name: @import
atDirectives.description: The @import CSS at-rule is used to import style rules from other style sheets.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Tailwind v4 theme configuration directive for defining design tokens.

atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use the @apply directive to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: Generate responsive variants of your own classes by wrapping their definitions in the @responsive directive.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: Create media queries that reference your breakpoints by name instead of duplicating their values.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Generate hover, focus, active and other variants of your own utilities.
